title: TinyVMI Documentation
content:
TinyVMI TinyVMI   is a lightweight implementation of LibVMI   in a minimized operating system.
TinyVMI is now being developed under a GSoC project. A blog is maintained to track its development progress.  Contribute to this documentation Feel free to update this content, just click the Edit this page link displayed on top right of each page, and pullrequest it
Documentation website This current documentation has been statically generated with Hugo, source code is available here at GitHub
